foreignData.name: Zwergische Bürgerwehr
foreignData.text: Wenn die Zwergische Bürgerwehr angreift und nicht geblockt wird, kannst Du wählen, dass sie in diesem Zug keinen Kampfschaden zufügt. Wenn Du dies tust, fügt die Zwergische Bürgerwehr einer Kreatur Deiner Wahl Schadenspunkte in Höhe ihrer Stärke zu.

name: Dwarven Vigilantes
originalText: If Dwarven Vigilantes attacks and is not blocked, you may choose to have it deal no combat damage this turn. If you do, Dwarven Vigilantes deals an amount of damage equal to its power to target creature.

rulings.text: An ability that triggers when something “attacks and isn’t blocked” triggers in the declare blockers step after blockers are declared if (1) that creature is attacking and (2) no creatures are declared to block it. It will trigger even if that creature was put onto the battlefield attacking rather than having been declared as an attacker in the declare attackers step.

text: Whenever Dwarven Vigilantes attacks and isn't blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Dwarven Vigilantes assigns no combat damage this turn.
